properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.default-query-tag
properties.description: Tag to query for in service list if one is not listed in serverListQueryTags.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.enabled
properties.description: Is service discovery enabled?

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.health-check-interval
properties.description: How often to perform the health check (e.g. 10s)

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.health-check-path
properties.description: Alternate server path to invoke for health checking

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.health-check-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for health check (e.g. 10s)

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.health-check-url
properties.description: Custom health check url to override default

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.hostname
properties.description: Hostname to use when accessing server

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.hostname
properties.description: Hostname to use when accessing server

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.instance-id
properties.description: Unique service instance id

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.ip-address
properties.description:
IP address to use when accessing service (must also set preferIpAddress
			to use)

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.management-port
properties.description: Port to register the management service under (defaults to management port)

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.management-suffix
properties.description: Suffix to use when registering management service

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.management-tags
properties.description: Tags to use when registering management service

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.port
properties.description: Port to register the service under (defaults to listening port)

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.prefer-agent-address
properties.description: Source of how we will determine the address to use

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.prefer-ip-address
properties.description: Use ip address rather than hostname during registration

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.query-passing
properties.description:
Add the 'passing` parameter to /v1/health/service/serviceName.
 This pushes health check passing to the server.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.register
properties.description: Register as a service in consul.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.register-health-check
properties.description: Register health check in consul. Useful during development of a service.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.scheme
properties.description: Whether to register an http or https service

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.server-list-query-tags
properties.description:
Map of serviceId's -> tag to query for in server list.
 This allows filtering services by a single tag.

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.service-name
properties.description: Service name

properties.name: spring.cloud.consul.discovery.tags
properties.description: Tags to use when registering service
